resources.string: This app has the purpose of guiding the users to the destination they want to reach inside the University Alexandru Ioan Cuza. The functionality of the app is to display on the user\'s phone screen navigation instructions generated by scanning QR codes wich are placed in different locations inside the University.

string.name: instructions
string.font:
Navigation steps

Step 1: First you need to go to the menu page then select 'Choose building' and pick the one corresponding to your location 
Step 2: Enter your location either by text or scanning a QR code
Step 3: You have to type in your destination.
Step 4: Hit the button Start Navigation.
Step 5: Follow the instructions that show up on your phone screen until the next check point that you have to scan which will be mentioned in the indications.
Step 6: When you reach your destination a message will appear. 

Themes

On the menu page you have an option called 'Change Theme' which allows you to choose the theme you want to apply.
